EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #3 - US - 2014.09.09.Email - Thank You - US
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar: “Accelerate and Optimize Agile Software Development with Tosca Testsuite”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Accelerate and Optimize Agile Software Development with Tosca Testsuite
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thanks for taking the time to attend our webinar, “Accelerate and Optimize Agile Software Development with Tosca Testsuite.” We hope you enjoyed it as much as we did. Your participation and engaging questions made all the difference.
Check out www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts> for recordings of this and other webinars.. Thanks,
The Tricentis Webinar Team
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-sales Consulting Tricentis
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
